metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7246 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the pcre32_copy_substring function in pcre_get.c in libpcre1 in PCRE 8.40 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (WRITE of size 268) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is actually an issue in the pcretest binary, which we don't ship in Ubuntu same commit as CVE-2017-7245

criterions.comment: pcre3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
